categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ophim was a male Imperial pilot who lived during the Age of the Empire. In 14 BBY, he served as Colonel Belkor Dray's pilot during Cham Syndulla's attempt to assassinate Emperor Palpatine and Darth Vader. Ophim was loyal to Belkor and believed his claim that Moff Delian Mors was conspiring with the Free Ryloth Movement to kill the Emperor and Lord Vader. While searching for Mors, Belkor killed Ophim in order to cover up his dealings with Cham. Ophim's corpse was destroyed along with Belkor and his recon craft when Moff Mors ordered one of her V-wings to shoot him out of the sky.
